items.sentence: I think you could get Tom to help you do that.
Tom didn't ask Mary for permission to do that.
Tom and Mary are planning on getting divorced.
Tom hasn't yet told Mary what she ought to do.
Tom hasn't told Mary what she ought to do yet.
Tom doesn't like it when people say no to him.
I'd probably lose if I played tennis with Tom.
I've already promised to show Tom around town.
I need to talk to Tom. The rest of you may go.
Tom was the one who actually wrote the letter.
